scripts.start: npm run css:watch & npm run vendor & budo src/main.coffee:dist/app.js --no-debug --live --port 3000 -- -t coffeeify -x=vue
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run app && NODE_ENV=production npm run vendor && npm run css:dist && hashly ./dist ./dist && recalper index.html dist/manifest.json dist/index.html path hashedPath dist
scripts.app: browserify -t coffeeify src/main.coffee --external=vue | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > dist/app.js
